channel.title: Blog on OrganGrinderrr
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on OrganGrinderrr

item.title: Archlinux Customization Full Guide
item.description: archlinux minimal installation # grab image file from arch boot website proceed to mirror config ctrl + c and cat /etc/pacman.d/mirrorlist select your nearest node, eg http://uk.mirror.archlinuxarm.org/$arch/$repo partitioning, go with default scheme install package fully automatic install boot loader setup users and package manager # add user to sudoer change hostname ln -s /usr/bin/nvim /usr/bin/vi install yay from source install hyprland or sway # yay -S hyprland-git UTM have to switch to gl hardware configure hyprland, resolution,scale and refresh rate install login manager tui-greet # systemctl enable greetd configure /etc/greetd/config.

item.title: Lovely Cameron
item.description: Chapter 1: The Havoc family # Hugo was born and raised in a poor village. He has a psychotic family line, spanning across multiple generations. His whole childhood was full of crap. His parents would get into a fight every other day. Always felt like this family was a wrecking ship, at risk of sinking with each wave crashing fight. Despite his best efforts of screaming and yelling for help, nobody ever answered back.

item.title: Install Nethunter on Oneplus 8T
item.description: Step 1. Download prerequsitions. # CrDroid-8.7-kebab-ROM payload-dumper-go Nethunter-crdroid-overlay Nethunter-crdroid-kernel Magisk TWRP-recovery Step 2. Flash crdroid rom # Reboot into fastboot and exec the following command. unzip crDroidAndroid-12.1-20220728-kebab-v8.7.zip tar xzvf payload-dumper-go*.tar.gz chmod +x ./payload-dumper-go* ./payload-dumper-go* payload.bin cd extracted_*_* ls -1 *.img | sed s/.img//g | xargs -I {} fastboot flash {} {}.img If you encounter some error, you might need to disable oem lock by fastboot oem unlock And if there are errors about not enough disk space left, you should delete some partitions.
